value:
$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|$w0|My friends, Prince Alfonse and
his group have arrived. We must
do our best to defeat them!$k$pHow odd, that we can only be free
of our contract if we fail to do so.$k$pStill, I will bring the full force of
my sword. And you, Lilina, must
unleash your fiercest flames!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_ロイ,ch02_00_Roy_M_Normal,Face|$w0|You've more than proven that
your power is superior to ours.
Well done, Prince Alfonse.$k$pBut I believe that I should give most
of the credit to your talented
tactician, $Nu!$k$pNow, farewell. May we all battle
on the same side one day.$k

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|Excellent job, everyone. We have
released the World of Binding
from Veronica's contract.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|That was our toughest battle yet.
How are you holding up,
$Nu?$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|$w0|You seem pretty calm to me.
Why, I'm boiling over! But that's
probably just all this heat.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Every world has such different
terrain than our own. Trees,
ruins, lava...$k$pTactician! Have any of these worlds
been like your own?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I suppose we don't know much
about your world. And how rude
of us not to ask until now!$k$p$EFace_Smile|What? Your world has buildings
that scrape the sky? And what do
you mean by "cars"?$k$pLike wagons...that run without
horses...and are made of metal?
Fascinating.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I've never seen a gateway that goes
to such a world.$k$pUh, what? You want to know how
you'll get home, then?$k$p$EFace_Smile|Details, details! Besides, you're
one of us now. Our home is your
home. So, let's head back!$k$Sbs150|
